abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies awards $2,000 scholarship to Natasha Jackson to help her pay for enrollment at College of New Rochelle; federation is one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Natasha Jackson of the Bronx is a 41-year-old college senior with a daughter, 14, a son, 9, and a job as administrative assistant with a state authority.

headline.main: A Single Mother’s Busy School Days (and Nights)
headline.print_headline: Single Bronx Mother of 2 and College Senior Has Long School Days (and Nights)

snippet: Natasha Jackson of the Bronx is a 41-year-old college senior with a daughter, 14, a son, 9, and a job as administrative assistant with a state authority.
